title: Deliberating On The Many Definitions Of Artificial General Intelligence
description: AGI is a moniker that has its ups and downs. Believe it or not, there isn't a universally accepted definition of AGI. I explore crucial ins and outs. An AI Insider scoop.
content: In today’s column, I examine an unresolved controversy in the AI field that hasn’t received the attention it rightfully deserves, namely, what constitutes a sensible and universally agreed-upon definition for pinnacle AI, commonly and vaguely referre... [17319 chars]

title: FTC launces inquiry into AI chatbots acting as companions and their effects on children
description: The FTC has launched an inquiry into several social media and artificial intelligence companies about the potential harms to children and teenagers who use their AI chatbots as companions.
content:
(AP) - The Federal Trade Commission has launched an inquiry into several social media and artificial intelligence companies about the potential harms to children and teenagers who use their AI chatbots as companions.

title: OpenAI nonprofit gains $100B stake while retaining control of AI company
description: Artificial intelligence giant OpenAI has announced its nonprofit parent company will retain control while gaining an equity stake worth more than $100 billion.
content:
Artificial intelligence giant OpenAI on Thursday announced its nonprofit parent will retain control of the company while also gaining an equity stake worth more than $100 billion.
The move will allow OpenAI to raise new capital while also making its ... [2601 chars]

title: Hong Kong Stock ETFs Get Record China Money on AI, Biotech Craze
description: Hot themes from artificial intelligence to biotech have driven Chinese investors to pour record amounts of cash into locally listed exchange-traded funds that track Hong Kong stocks, a trend that analysts say is likely to continue.
content:

title: Delhi high court bars use of Aishwarya Rai’s name, image and voice without consent
description: In her suit, Bachchan said that various people were infringing her publicity and personality rights by using her name, voice and video for illegal commercial purposes, morphing her image using artificial intelligence and other technology on video clips, including those of a pornographic nature. | Latest News India
content: The Delhi High Court on Thursday protected the interests of actor Aishwarya Rai Bachchan by restraining entities from commercially exploiting her name, image and voice without consent, concluding that unauthorised use of a celebrity’s identity not on... [2589 chars]

title: Daystar University and MindHYVE.ai Launch AI-Powered Higher Education Transformation in Kenya
description: **media[745260]**NAIROBI, Kenya and NEWPORT BEACH, Calif, Sept. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Daystar University, one of Kenya's premier private Christian liberal arts institutions, and MindHYVE.ai, Inc., a global innovator in artificial intelligence, have entered into a landmark partnership to embed ArthurAI™, MindHYVE's agentic AI learning platform, across Daystar's academic ecosystem.**media[745261]**

title: Craft Silicon and MindHYVE.ai Forge Strategic Partnership to Deploy Agentic AI Across Africa's Workforce and Education Systems
description: **media[745237]**NAIROBI, Kenya and NEWPORT BEACH, Calif., Sept. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Craft Silicon Ltd., a leading global fintech innovator headquartered in Nairobi, and MindHYVE.ai, Inc., a pioneer in agentic artificial intelligence (AGI), announced a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to introduce ArthurAI™, a next-generation autonomous learning platform, into African markets.**media[745238]**
